snippet: Regulators said that though the deal between Express Scripts and Medco Health Solutions would create the industry’s biggest company, the market was more competitive than it first appeared.
abstract: Federal Trade Commission approves by a 3-to-1 vote the $29 billion merger between Express Scripts and Medco Health Solutions; two pharmacy benefit managers say their merger will result in significant savings for consumers.

byline.original: By REED ABELSON and NATASHA SINGER

lead_paragraph: Regulators said that though the deal between Express Scripts and Medco Health Solutions would create the industry’s biggest company, the market was more competitive than it first appeared.

headline.seo: F.T.C. Approves Merger of Express Scripts and Medco
headline.main: F.T.C. Approves Merger of 2 of the Biggest Pharmacy Benefit Managers
headline.print_headline: F.T.C. Approves Merger of 2 of the Biggest Pharmacy Benefit Managers
